name: SquishMan Adventures
description:
A platformer where you make your way through 5 different level.

Game only playable with a controller.

Onboarding level - Made by Kazemurai, Funkyruben, Bonitaka and AtmosFabula

Moving platform level - Made by Kazemurai

Wall-jumpable Walls level - Made by FunkyRuben

Destructible Platforms level - Made by Bonitāka

Jumppads level - Made by AtmosFabula 

This is a Student project experimenting with platforming mechanics made for Buas.
